best_gem_comment: Class is an absolute gem!! The professor is so funny and the topics are genuinely interesting :) Work load also isn't a lot and an amazing CS class!!

useful_title: Design of Useful and Usable Interactive Systems
best_gem_comment: Take this class!! Though considered a CS "gem", this course is extremely useful for future SWEs, PMs, Designers, or any tech–adjacent working person. Lectures and sections are fun and interesting and assignments are as fun as you let them be (you can kind of get creative). No CS experience necessary – many successful non–STEM majors take this course.
best_gem_comment_short: Though considered a CS "gem", this course is extremely useful for future SWEs, PMs, Designers, or any tech–adjacent working person.
